info.title: Healthcare Marketplace API
info.description: Retrieves information from the Healthcare Marketplace.

get.description: Get county information for a specific ZIP code

parameters.name: zipcode
parameters.description: The ZIP code to retrieve the county information for

parameters.name: apikey
parameters.description: API key for accessing the service

post.description: Search for healthcare plans based on provided criteria

get.description: Retrieve details for a specific healthcare plan

parameters.name: planid
parameters.description: The ID of the healthcare plan to retrieve details for

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: The year for which the plan details are requested

parameters.name: apikey
parameters.description: API key for accessing the service

get.description: Autocomplete functionality to search for drugs

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Partial query for the drug search autocomplete

get.description: Check if drugs are covered under specific healthcare plans
Retrieve plan crosswalk information for a given plan ID, year, state, ZIP code, and FIPS code
Retrieve county information by county ID for a specific year
Retrieve information about states for a specific year
Retrieve information for a specific state by its code for a given year

parameters.name: stateCode
parameters.description: The state code to retrieve information for

parameters.name: apikey
parameters.description: API key for accessing the service

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: The year for which the information is requested

get.description: Retrieve Medicaid information for a specific state, year, and quarter

parameters.name: stateCode
parameters.description: The state code to retrieve Medicaid information for

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: The year for which the Medicaid information is requested

parameters.name: quarter
parameters.description: The quarter for which the Medicaid information is requested

parameters.name: apikey
parameters.description: API key for accessing the service

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: The year for which the poverty guidelines are requested

parameters.name: apikey

get.description: Retrieve rate area information based on state, FIPS code, ZIP code, market, and year

parameters.description: The state to retrieve rate areas for

parameters.name: fips
parameters.description: The FIPS code to retrieve rate areas for

parameters.name: zipcode
parameters.description: The ZIP code to retrieve rate areas for

parameters.name: market
parameters.description: The market type to retrieve rate areas for

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: The year to retrieve rate areas for

parameters.name: apikey
parameters.description: API key for accessing the service

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of provider identifiers to check coverage for
